name: Atlantic Graphics
duties: Standardised materials to reduce waste & stock and to increase discounts and job consistency

Account Manager's point of contact for any graphic related queries

Projects include: Menu communication for 320 Sainsbury Cafes & 70 Man-U Kiosks

name: Atlantic Shopfit

Procurement, preparing and analysing costings for tenders

name: House of Fraser
duties: Responsibility for re-stocking, managing new merchandise, preparation of merchandise for shop floor
On shop floor – assisted customers with any enquiries or problems

name: Sitel

Utilising up to nine software applications

name: Atlantic Graphics

name: NHS Direct
